title: ISR & Revalidation: A Practical Checklist
summary: Real-world guardrails for Next.js ISR: timeouts, on-demand revalidation, and failure modes.

body.raw:
## Checklist
- Use headers for per-page revalidation insight
- Log revalidateTag calls and failures
- Add a backstop runtime cache for critical pages
